item2: Article attributes Stock Category can be changed manually
item4: Get an indication of a property change
item7: If there is no qualified pallet detail data, the system will prompt to check that there is no available inventory detail information. The user can perform Data Inquire-> Q080 Inventory Data Query job to query inventory detail information
item8: Enter the query conditions and click Query to query the inventory details list
item10: Only the attributes of the same pallet detail line can be changed; if there are partial changes, you need to do P060 Transfer Out and P070 Pallet Inventory Adjustment before implementing
